titles.title: A bill to amend the Higher Education Act of 1965 to strengthen the future workforce and reduce the cost of postsecondary education by reducing rates of postsecondary remediation.
Promoting Readiness in Education to Prevent Additional Remediation and Expense Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.
